item.title: PT OTSUKA INDONESIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Otsuka Indonesia was established in 1974 as a joint venture company in the pharmaceutical industry with Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd., Japan.

Built on an area of ​​48,397 m² in Lawang, a small town in East Java, PT Otsuka Indonesia Factory manufactures and markets medicinal products including Infusion/Injection Fluids and Ethical Medicines, as well as Nutritional Products for Special Medical purposes and Medical Device Products.

Infusion fluid products have successfully penetrated the pharmaceutical market and have the best reputation in Indonesia. This success has encouraged us to go further in the pharmaceutical industry by producing ethical drugs, nutrition for special medical purposes and medical devices that have met the standardization requirements of CPOB (Good Manufacturing Practices of Medicine), CPAKB (Good Manufacturing Practices of Medical Devices) Good) and CPPOB (Good Processed Food Production Methods). Where this success was followed by our success in obtaining ISO 9001 certification for Quality Management System, ISO 22000 for Food Safety Management System, ISO 14001 for Environmental Management System, ISO 50001 for Energy Management System, Halal Certificate and AEO Certificate for customs certification in the field of export and import.

The business diversification step taken by PT Otsuka Indonesia continues to grow, not only in Indonesia, but we have also expanded by exporting to several countries such as Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Myanmar, Vietnam, Philippines, Mongolia, Sri Lanka, Thailand. , India and Egypt.

For decades, PT Otsuka Indonesia has proven to be able to dominate the Infusion Liquid business and to continue to strengthen this position, we are always challenged to continue to develop new products to meet customer needs on an ongoing basis.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015
  • Amount Project : 300 - 400 Million
  • Category : Pharmaceutical

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Clyde Bergeman Indonesia ( CBIA ) has been a part of the Clyde Bergemann SE-Arm. since 2010. Its markets throughout Southeast Asia include Indonesia, Malaysia, Phillipine, Singapore, and Vietnam.

Clyde Bergemann Indonesia PT or often known as CBIA is a business engaged in Steam Boiler, Equipment & Supply

Project Info:

  • Amount Project : 2- 3 Billion
  • Category : Steam Boiler, Generator

item.title: PT DALLE ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTION
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Dalle Engineering Construction, Established since 2002, DEC scope of services covering all the project requirement from a basic concept design, up to commissioning/operations and hand over to the owner Company Profile DEC.

DEC provides Engineering, Procurement and all Construction aspect.

PT. Dalle Engineering Construction (DEC) is very conscious and flexible to its role in the project. DEC can provide a wide spectrum of scope from limited services such as specific study or design, temporary extension to Client capability, depending in client requirement.

DEC is prepared to take the following type of contract:
- Lump sump contract for well defined scope services
- Unit rate for service to define contents
- Cost plus fee

Combined with its associates DEC has the resources to provide a complete Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC).

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015 & 2019
  • Amount Project : 1 - 3 Billion
  • Category : Construction

Overall:<\/strong><\/h5>

PT Dalle Engineering Construction, Established since 2002, DEC scope of services covering all the project requirement from a basic concept design, up to commissioning\/operations and hand over to the owner Company Profile DEC.<\/p>

DEC provides Engineering, Procurement and all Construction aspect.<\/p>

PT. Dalle Engineering Construction (DEC) is very conscious and flexible to its role in the project. DEC can provide a wide spectrum of scope from limited services such as specific study or design, temporary extension to Client capability, depending in client requirement.<\/p>

DEC is prepared to take the following type of contract:
- Lump sump contract for well defined scope services
- Unit rate for service to define contents
- Cost plus fee<\/p>

Combined with its associates DEC has the resources to provide a complete Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC).<\/p>","_margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_padding_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false},{"id":"18acaa5","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"padding_mobile":{"unit":"%","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"7","left":"0","isLinked":false},"margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"padding":{"unit":"%","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_inline_size":27,"padding_tablet":{"unit":"%","top":"","right":"","bottom":"","left":"","isLinked":true}},"elements":[{"id":"830292c","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

item.title: PT AMERICAN STANDARD INDONESIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

As the most iconic sanitation brand, American Standard Indonesia has earned consumers trust by consistently providing style, quality and reliability in every bathroom. Today, with a more than 140 year long history, American Standard continues to raise the bar in providing reliable bathroom solutions by combining meaningful design and innovative technology to create a bathroom that offers consumers both comfort and performance.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2016 - 2018
  • Amount Project : 300 - 700 Million
  • Category : Interior

Get in touch

item.title: PT UNITED TRACTORS PANDU ENGINEERING
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT United Tractors Pandu Engineering through its brand, PATRiA was established in February 8, 1983. It was initially built to meet the increasing demand of industries development in Indonesia. As one of Indonesia's leading company in heavy equipment manufacturing & engineering, PATRiA provides solutions based on customer's specific needs.

Our business competence lies on our ability to fullfill customer’s requirement through a breakthrough design and innovation, in order to optimize their productivity. Equipped with the latest technology on manufacturing system and qualified engineering of ours, PATRiA will ensure the production runs faster, more efficient and reliable to deliver the product as it’s scheduled. As a completed cycle of the best solutions, PATRiA also gives more value by facilitating customers with excellent after sales services.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015 - 2020
  • Amount Project : 1 - 5 Billion
  • Category : Machinery

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces

item.title: PT WIJAYA KARYA (PERSERO) TBK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

WIKA began as a company engaging in electrical and plumbing installation work, and in the 70s, shifted into becoming a civil and building contractor company.

Through Initial Public Offering (IPO) in the Indonesia Stock Exchange on 27 October 2007, WIKA released 28.46 percent of its shares to the public, while the Government of the Republic of Indonesia owns the rest. The funds received from the IPO has helped WIKA to be more flexible in its growth and development.

The Company continues to take various anticipative and innovative measures to help its development, resulting in its strong position amidst national and global crisis.

In 2019, WIKA officially launched its 2030 Vision and Mission to enable the Company in overcoming future challenges as a company engaging in sustainable investment and Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) for better quality of life. WIKA believe, its 2030 Vision is an actualization and harmonization of its principles (people, planet, and profit) while still in line with the objective of sustainable development. WIKA is committed to play its vital role in creating a better quality of life.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2014 - 2019
  • Amount Project : 20 - 21 Billion
  • Category : Construction

item.title: PT GARUDA MAINTENANCE FACILITY AERO ASIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT. Garuda Maintenance Facility Aero Asia Tbk (GMFI) is engaged in aircraft maintenance services, component maintenance and calibration, engine maintenance for aircraft and industry, manufacturing and maintenance of supporting facilities, engineering services, material services, logistics, warehousing and consignment as well as consulting services. , training and provision of experts in the field of aircraft maintenance, components and engines. The company was founded on April 26, 2002. The company is a company owned by PT. Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk (GIAA).

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015 - 2017
  • Amout Project : 9 - 10 Billion
  • Category : Aviation

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces
item.excerpt:encoded: GMF AeroAsia is now rightly consider as one of the biggest aircraft maintenance company in the region, providing the excellence of integrated solutions to all customers around the world.

item.title: PT ELNUSA TBK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Elnusa Tbk is present in the energy industry with understanding that this industry is one of the main pillars of our country and continuously improves the service and quality of our service. One of the efforts to strengthen the existence of the company, we assign ourselves to be an integrated energy services company that provides total solutions. Along with a strong commitment and continuous innovation, the company's contribution will be progressively visible in the oil and gas industry.

PT Elnusa Tbk continues to focus on business and company growth with dynamic conditions and challenges. We always administer the company to always prioritize the principle of Total Solution. We apply this principle to strengthen the company position that always thrives according to need. Furthermore, we also direct the company to always strive to improve the quality of human resources to support the company's development so that company could grow more rapidly.

Company's name was changed from PT Elektronika Nusantara to PT Elnusa based on Notarial Deed No. 18 dated June 8, 1984 made before Sinta Susikto, Notary, in Jakarta. This change has a strong foundation, namely by the name of Elnusa, the Company has the ability to not only be a service company in the largest oil and gas sector in Indonesia, its human resources also meet international standards in the field they are involved in.

Project Info:

Period : 2016 - 2020

Amount Project : 1 - 5.5 Billion

Category : Generator

item.title: PT PERTAMINA GAS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Pertamina Gas is a company engaged in the midstream and downstream sectors of the Indonesian gas industry. Owned by PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk. (PGN) and PT Pertamina (Persero), Pertamina Gas is part of the Gas subholding in Indonesia which plays a role in gas trading, gas transportation, gas processing and gas distribution, as well as other businesses related to natural gas and its derivative products.

PT Pertamina Gas was established on February 23, 2007. The establishment was to comply with the provisions of Law no. 22/2001 and the increasing demand for gas commodities in Indonesia as an environmentally friendly alternative energy substitute for fuel oil. At the same time, this effort will provide added value for gas exploitation. Pertamina Gas continues to develop its business by developing new gas transmission pipelines, new household gas networks and other gas facility projects throughout Indonesia to ensure domestic energy supply needs.

This business will provide added value to the gas business in Indonesia. The competence of PGN and Pertamina in managing the gas business will encourage Pertamina Gas to become the main energy company in Indonesia. Pertamina Gas is here to support Indonesia's energy security. Mutual support from PGN and Pertamina, as well as other affiliates, will produce strong synergies in the gas business.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2016 & 2020
  • Amount Project : 100 - 200 Million
  • Category : Gas Energy

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces

item.title: PT BARATA INDONESIA (PERSERO)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Barata Indonesia (Persero) is an Indonesian state-owned company engaged in the heavy industry sector. The company casts steel for a variety of tools, and provides manufacturing and EPC services.

PT Barata Indonesia (Persero) has undergone several stages of transformation since its establishment. Starting from the forerunner of the Company "NV BRAAT" in 1901 until now there have been quite significant changes but still have a common line of business that is a priority for the Company.

Project Info:

Period : 2018 - 2020

Amount Project : 4 Billion

Category : Foundry

item.title: PT NOKIA SOLUTIONS AND NETWORKS INDONESIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

At Nokia Solutions and Network Indonesia, we create technology that helps the world act together.

The world is facing fundamental challenges. Pressure on the planet is increasing, productivity is stalling and access to opportunity remains stubbornly unequal. Technology is central to the solution.

Through technology leadership and trusted partnerships, we deliver critical networks to help address global issues.  We have the power to bring together the world’s people, machines and devices, sensing and acting in real time at massive scale. Our critical networks go beyond connectivity to enable self-optimizing, intelligent systems both locally and globally.

With our customers we deliver solutions that respond to climate change through more efficient use and re-use of the world’s resources, restore productivity growth by bringing digital to the physical industries it has not yet reached and provide more inclusive access globally to work, healthcare and education.

We create meaningful interactions to drive human progress.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015 - 2020
  • Amount Project : 4 - 5 Billion
  • Category : Telecommunication

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces

item.title: PT HUTAMA KARYA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Hutama Karya is an infrastructure development company wholly owned by the Indonesian government. It was founded at the beginning of the 20th century as a private Dutch construction company called East Indies' Hollandsche Beton Maatschappij. In the 1960s the Company underwent a transformation phase, which led to organizational restructuring and then the nationalization of the business. During this period, Hutama Karya produced a number of monumental and historic construction works, such as the Semanggi Bridge, Ampera Bridge, MPR/DPR Building and the Pancoran Monument.

Since its inception, Hutama Karya has always played a role in national and international infrastructure development. The emergence of prestressed concrete technology in the early 1970s and the BBRV system, which is a wire system used in concrete reactor containers and cages. developed since 1949 by Birkenmeier, Brandestini, Ros and Vogt, four Swiss engineers then accelerated Hutama Karya's business, which gave birth to a special division of prestressed concrete. In the 1980s, the Company utilized breakthrough technology and various types of astakona (octagonal) steel for street lighting poles. The HakaPole Business Unit was then established as a form of company diversification.

Hutama Karya then invested in expanding overseas markets and innovating using new technologies such as Dr. Sosrobahu (Barrier Free Playground) by Dr. Ir. Tjokorda Raka Sukawati. The completion of large-scale important projects, such as the MPR/DPR Building, Semanggi Bridge, Tanjung Priok Access Toll Road, Ampera Palembang Bridge, Bali-Mandara Toll Road in Bali, and the Metro Manila Skyway flyover in the Philippines, further confirms Hutama Karya's reputation as a trusted infrastructure developer.

Hutama Karya also produces high-tech bridges, ranging from cable-stayed and double-sided cantilever bridges to steel arches and cable piles as well as various developments in the private sector, such as skyscrapers (Bakrie Tower Apartments) from infrastructure (toll roads). The achievement of ISO 14001:2004, OHSAS 18001:2007, and ISO 9001:2008 certificates, proves that Hutama Karya prioritizes quality and quality in every work and continues to transform from time to time.

In mid-2014, Hutama Karya officially accepted the government's assignment to develop the Trans-Sumatra Toll Road. Through Presidential Regulation (Perpres) Number 100 of 2014 which was later updated to Presidential Regulation Number 117 of 2015, Hutama Karya was given the mandate to develop 2,770 kilometers of toll roads in Sumatra with a priority of the first 8 sections until 2019 along 650 kilometers.

At this time, PT Hutama Karya (Persero) has established a new subsidiary in the field of Toll Road and Bridge Infrastructure Construction to support the government's mandate. This assignment is one of the important milestones in the history of the company, because it was during this period that PT. Hutama Karya (Persero) began to write its new history as Indonesia's Leading Infrastructure Developer or Indonesia's Most Valuable Infrastructure Developer (IMVID).

Project Info:
  • Period : 2019
  • Amount Project : 4 Billion
  • Category : Construction

item.title: PT APM HYUNDAI TRANSYS INDONESIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Hyundai invested USD 1.55 billion to develop its first manufacturing center in ASEAN. Established in 2019, this modern factory is located on an 8.35 million square feet (77.6 hectares) site in Kota Deltamas, Bekasi, which will be operated by PT Hyundai Motor Manufacturing Indonesia (HMMI). The plant is expected to start commercial production in the second half of 2021 with an annual capacity of 150,000 units and eventually 250,000 units annually when it reaches its maximum capacity.

Through its state-of-the-art factory, Hyundai will present its latest products and technologies in Indonesia as well as to key markets in other ASEAN regions. Hyundai's manufacturing plant will also provide thousands of jobs for workers in the region and in the long term, the company is developing world-class electric vehicle (EV) production at its factory located in Indonesia.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2020
  • Amount Project : 3 - 4 Billion
  • Category : Manufacture

Get in touch

item.excerpt:encoded: Established in 2020, PT APM Hyundai Transys Indonesia is a joint venture company between PT APM Automotive Indonesia and Hyundai Transys Inc

The plant is expected to start commercial production in the second half of 2021 with an annual capacity of 150,000 units and eventually 250,000 units annually when it reaches its maximum capacity.<\/p>

Through its state-of-the-art factory, Hyundai will present its latest products and technologies in Indonesia as well as to key markets in other ASEAN regions. Hyundai's manufacturing plant will also provide thousands of jobs for workers in the region and in the long term, the company is developing world-class electric vehicle (EV) production at its factory located in Indonesia.<\/p>","_margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_padding_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false},{"id":"18acaa5","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"padding_mobile":{"unit":"%","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"7","left":"0","isLinked":false},"margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"padding":{"unit":"%","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_inline_size":27,"padding_tablet":{"unit":"%","top":"","right":"","bottom":"","left":"","isLinked":true}},"elements":[{"id":"830292c","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

item.title: PT INDONESIA POWER
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Indonesia Power is a subsidiary of PT PLN (Persero) which was established on October 3, 1995 under the name PT PLN Pembangkitan Jawa Bali I (PT PJB I). On October 8, 2000, PT PJB I changed its name to Indonesia Power as a confirmation of the Company's goal to become a purely business-oriented independent power generation company.

The Company's main business activities currently focus on being a provider of electricity through power generation and as a service provider for the operation and maintenance of power plants that operate power plants spread across Indonesia. In addition to managing the Generating Unit, Indonesia Power has 5 Subsidiaries, 2 Joint Venture Companies, 1 Associate Company, 3 Grand Child Companies (Affiliates of Subsidiaries) to support the Company's business strategies and processes.

Project Info:

Period : 2017 - 2020

Amount Project : 2 - 3 Billion

Category : Electricity Energy

item.title: PT HONDA PRECISION PARTS MANUFACTURING
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Honda Precision Parts Manufacturing established in Indonesian as a contribution to the development of the world automobile industry and is a further breakthrough from Honda.

Established on an area of 130,000 square meters in the industrial area Indotaisei Cikampek, Karawang, West Java, Indonesia On June 6, 2002.

In September 2003 has started production of Automatic Transmission and Engine Valve which is supplied to the domestic and foreign markets and in 2006 it has begun production of a 4WD.

And recently in 2014 has started production of the M-CVT transmission Mission which is a new framework and conduct inhouse production for CVT Belt and Pulley.

By doing so, Honda Precision Parts Manufacturing become more competitive and gain consumer confidence Honda Precision Parts Manufacturing, through delivery of products to the world HPPM determined to be true as Power Train Leading Company

Project Info:
  • Period : 2014 - 2020
  • Amount Project : 2 - 3 Billion
  • Category : Manufacture

item.title: PT KOMATSU UNDERCARRIAGE INDONESIA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

Komatsu Undercarriage Indonesia provides essential equipment, technologies and services for the construction, mining, forest, energy and manufacturing industries. Our global service and distributor network support customer operations using the power of data and technology to help enhance safety, productivity and performance.

For the last century, the companies that power society and develop the world’s infrastructure have relied on Komatsu to empower them. Through manufacturing, technology and service innovation with a reputation for dantotsu quality, reliability, insights and support, we work as partners to create lasting value for your business.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2018 - 2020
  • Amount Project : 2 - 3 Billion
  • Category : Manufacture

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces

item.title: PT TAISHO PHARMACEUTICAL INDONESIA TBK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Taisho Pharmaceutical Indonesia Tbk (the "Company") was originally established as PT Squibb Indonesia in 1970. The company started its commercial activities in 1972. The company is engaged in the pharmaceutical industry by producing over-the-counter (OTC) drugs and ethical products. (prescription drugs) for both the domestic and export markets. In accordance with Article 3 of the Company's Articles of Association, the Company's activities are to develop, register, process, manufacture and sell chemical, pharmaceutical and health care products. In 2009, ownership of the Company was taken by Taisho Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd., a Japanese corporation. The Company's Head Office is located at Millennium Centennial Center lt. 8, Jl. Gen. Sudirman Kav. 25, Jakarta 12920. The Company's factory is located at Jl. Raya Bogor Km. 38, Cilangkap, Depok 16958.

The Company's mission is to contribute to society by creating and offering superior pharmaceutical and health products and health-related information and services in a socially responsible manner so as to enrich people's lives through the improvement of health and beauty..

Project Info:
  • Period : 2016
  • Amount Project : 400 Million
  • Category : Pharmaceutical

item.title: PT CEMINDO GEMILANG
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next
Overall:

PT Cemindo Gemilang which was established in 2011 is a premium quality cement producer with the trademark Semen Merah Putih. Since its inception, PT Cemindo Gemilang is committed to maintaining consistent quality through the supply of the best cement raw materials and the construction of factories with the latest technology operated by a professional workforce.

Currently, PT Cemindo Gemilang has six factories in Indonesia spread across Banten, East Java, West Kalimantan, North Sumatra and Bengkulu.

Within five years, PT Cemindo Gemilang managed to distribute Semen Merah Putih to 17 provinces in Indonesia with distribution and marketing networks on the islands of Sumatra, Kalimantan, Java, Bali and Nusa Tenggara. Going forward, Semen Merah Putih will continue to increase its distribution area, in accordance with PT Cemindo Gemilang's commitment to provide premium quality cement throughout Indonesia.

The commitment of PT Cemindo Gemilang to get the appreciation of the Indonesian people, Semen Merah Putih received the Home Preferred Brand award for the Best Portland Cement category, the choice of Media Bintang Group Indonesia readers for two consecutive years in 2015-2016.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2015 - 2020
  • Amount Project : 600 - 700 Million
  • Category : Material, Construction

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces

item.title: KOMANDAN PUSAT PENERBANGAN ANGKATAN DARAT
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Overall:

The Army Aviation Education Center or abbreviated as Pusdik Penerbad is the Implementing Agency for the Army Aviation Center which is located directly under Danpuspenerbad. Pusdik Penerbad is located at Jl. Siliwangi 506 West Semarang, Semarang, Central Java. At this time, the location of education is divided into 3 different locations which are close to each other.

The flight training was carried out at Satlatbangdik, Lanumad A Yani, Officers Education (Satdik Pa) was at the old Mako Pusdik Jl. Siliwangi 506 Semarang, and Education for NCO/Tamtama (Satdik Ba)/(Satdik Ta) are located at the new Mako Pusdik, Jl Bandara A Yani Semarang.

Sempana Pusdik Penerbad is “Adhika Uttama” which means “Best of the Best”.

Project Info:
  • Period : 2014 - 2015
  • Amount Project : 1 - 2 Billion
  • Category : Military

Get in touch

Contact by Whatsapp Contact by Email Our Marketplaces
